settingsPanel.title: Learning Settings
settingsPanel.iconMaster: Mark card as mastered (won't appear again)
settingsPanel.cardsPerBatchDescription: Number of cards to add at once
settingsPanel.autoAddCardsDescription: Automatically add new cards when none are due
settingsPanel.initialReviewsDescription: Number of pre-reviews before spaced repetition
settingsPanel.autoPlayDescription: Automatically play audio when a card is shown
settingsPanel.autoAdvanceDescription: Advance to next card after audio finishes
settingsPanel.repetitionsDescription: How many times each language is played per card
settingsPanel.playbackSequenceDescription: Preview of the audio playback order
